short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy and paste student grades from Google Sheets, Excel, or Pages directly into Infinite Campus with a few clicks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1) Copy adjacent columns with student names in the first column and scores in the second column.

2) Expand the target assignment in Infinite campus.

3) Right click and select "Paste Grades" ( not the default "Paste" ). 

Infinite Campus Autofill will match names and automatically paste the copied values for each student.  Any names that couldn't find a match will be left blank.

( If you don't see "Paste Grades" as an option, make sure a grade input is selected for the expanded assignment when you right click. )
